name: news_from_individual_source
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool f1_latest_news.
Tool description: This API scrapes the most recent F1 news articles from, the official F1 website, Sky F1, BBC F1, WTF1, and Autosport. More may be added in the future...
API description: With this endpoint you can specify the source of the articles you wish to get
/news/f1 for example, or any of the other 4: skyf1, BBCF1, WTF1, autosport.

sourceid.description: Identifier of the F1 news source (e.g., skyf1, BBCF1, WTF1, autosport).
